name: Old-School Themes Admin
author: Martin Robbins

sections.description: Display links to the old custom-header and custom-background admin pages in both the dashboard and the front-end toolbar.
sections.installation:
Download the plugin zip file

Upload via dashboard > plugins > add new > upload

Activate the plugin
sections.changelog:
0.1.3

  • Account for the toolbar top-level customize node (new in 4.3)

0.1.2

  • Add all links explicitly as new instead of CSS-unhiding the existing core links
  • Does not modify any core links
  • Position dashboard old-school links to the bottom of the appearance menu
  • Position toolbar old-school links into a single fly-out menu to the bottom of the appearance menu

0.1.1

  • Display all links in the dashboard appearance menu and in the front-end toolbar appearance menu
  • Relabel the customizer links in the dashboard appearance menu
  • Relabel the newly displayed old-school links in the front-end toolbar appearance menu

0.1.0

  • Original release displays old-school links in the toolbar appearance menu only and hides the customizer links

short_description: Display links to the old custom-header and custom-background admin pages in both the dashboard and the front-end toolbar.
description: Display links to the old custom-header and custom-background admin pages in both the dashboard and the front-end toolbar.
